This website is AudioEye enabled and is being optimized for accessibility. To open the AudioEye Toolbar, press "shift + =". Some assistive technologies may require the use of a passthrough function before this keystroke. For more information, activate the button labeled “Explore your accessibility options”.

  1. NEWS & ANNOUNCEMENTS

    Keep up to date with Woodbridge Township

  1. Senior Transportation of Woodbridge

    The Department of Health & Human Services offers reservation-based transportation services to the Township Senior Centers and special events for Senior residents (ages 60 & older) who have no other means of transportation. Read on... about Senior Transportation of Woodbridge

  2. The Club At Woodbridge

    The Club at Woodbridge has it all! With workout equipment, pool, sports courts, golf den, hockey den, and so much more! Read on... about The Club At Woodbridge

  3. Avenel Performing Arts Center

    The Avenel Performing Arts Center (APAC) is a multi-disciplinary performing arts center located in Avenel, New Jersey. Read on... about Avenel Performing Arts Center

  11. Woodbridge Township Senior Services

    View all the Upcoming Important Events hosted by Senior Services! Read on... about Woodbridge Township Senior Services

  12. 2025 Senior Services Directory

    A comprehensive directory to link senior citizens and their caregivers to programs and services to enhance quality of life and lead healthy lifestyles with aging in place with confidence and dignity. Read on... about 2025 Senior Services Directory

  13. Hometown Hero

    T. Nulty American Legion Post established the Woodbridge Township Hometown Hero project. The main goal was to respectfully honor all our men and women who are serving or have served their country in a branch of the military. Read on... about Hometown Hero

  14. Woodbridge History Museum

    Open Every Sunday 1:00pm- 4:00pm!

  19. Woodbridge Public Library

    The Woodbridge Public Library offers information and services to provide its community with opportunities for enjoyment, personal fulfillment, and lifelong learning. Read on... about Woodbridge Public Library

  20. Woodbridge CodeRED Emergency Notification System

    Using CodeRED Woodbridge Township is able to deliver important time-sensitive information to individuals who have registered to receive alerts Read on... about Woodbridge CodeRED Emergency Notification System

  21. Woodbridge Township Youth Centers

    Drop-In Centers Open To Middle School Children (Occasional Elementary Days) Read on... about Woodbridge Township Youth Centers

  22. Woodbridge Township Volunteer Directory

    This Directory will help you in your search for an organization that meets your inter-ests. Included herein are many worthwhile groups dependent on the caring people who are willing to give of their time to help others and the community. Read on... about Woodbridge Township Volunteer Directory

  23. Visit Downtown Woodbridge!

    Shop. Eat. Enjoy Local. Whether you're looking for the best dining and shopping options or the latest fitness class, Downtown Woodbridge has it all! Come visit Main Street in Woodbridge for anything you need. Downtown Dollars Available!

  24. Woodbridge Economic Development Corporation (WEDCO)

    Working to attract new businesses, as well as support the area’s already established businesses, the Woodbridge Economic Development Corporation (WEDCO) has designed a number of programs to create successful ventures for area entities. Read on... about Woodbridge Economic Development Corporation (WEDCO)
